nodes.text: These robes were worn by individuals who had just begun their training in the Baran Do philosophy. The Baran Do were Force-sensitives of the Kel Dor race and had been advisors and seers to the leaders of Kel Dor society. Their philosophy centered on seeking inner peace and consulting with the Force before making decisions.
Baran Do Novice robes were much like Jedi robes, only the inside was more creamy and the outside was redder.
These robes were easy to find. Most Jedi artifact traders sold these for around 100 credits.
